song_name: Take It Off - Billboard Radio Mix
lyrics:

theres a place downtown where the freaks all come around
it’s a hole in the wall its a dirty freeforall
when they—
theres a place downtown where the freaks all come around
it’s a hole in the wall its a dirty freeforall

verse 1
when the dark of the night
comes around thats the time
that the animal comes alive
looking for something wild

and now we lookin like pimps in my gold trans am

got my drunk text on ill regret it in the mornin
but tonight i dont give a​—

its a hole in the wall it’s a dirty freeforall

and they turn me on when they take it off
when they take it off everybody take it off
you might also likeverse 2

lose your clothes in the crowd
were delirious tear it down
til the sun comes back around

and im down to get faded im not the designated driver
so i dont give a​—
